rules:
Welcome to Sprinks N' Drinks!

1. Be respectful of ALL staff members! (No blocking/muting)

2. Be kind to your fellow drinkees, leave any and all issues at the door!

5. Tip your dealers with some drinks ;P

6. Get drunk, Get high, and have a good time!

Wanna join the team? Join our discord: https://discord.gg/GHUuh5FtVt
